info.name: Effective Todo
info.description: This is a REST API service for managing To-Do tasks

request.description:
**Description:** Retrieve all tasks (ordered by creation date, newest first)

**Request Body:** None

**Success Response:** `200 OK`

**Response Body:** Array of task objects

**Errors:** None

**Description:** Create a new task

**Request Body (JSON):**

- `title` (string, required, max 255)
    
- `description` (string, optional, max 1000)
    
- `status` (string, optional: `pending`, `in_progress`, `completed`)
    

**Success Response:** `201 Created`

**Response Body:** Task object

**Errors:** `422 Unprocessable Entity` (validation errors)

**Description:** Retrieve a single task by ID

**Path Params:**

- `id` (integer, required)
    

**Success Response:** `200 OK`

**Response Body:** Task object

**Errors:** `404 Not Found`

**Description:** Update an existing task (partial updates allowed)

**Path Params:**

- `id` (integer, required)
    

**Request Body (JSON):**

- `title` (string, optional, max 255)
    
- `description` (string, optional, max 1000)
    
- `status` (string, optional: `pending`, `in_progress`, `completed`)
    

**Success Response:** `200 OK`

**Response Body:** Updated task object

**Errors:** `422 Unprocessable Entity`, `404 Not Found`

**Description:** Delete a task by ID

**Path Params:**

- `id` (integer, required)
    

**Request Body:** None

**Success Response:** `204 No Content`

**Response Body:** None

**Errors:** `404 Not Found`
